definition: to possess great magical power/to possess remarkable abilities
God/abbr. for 神舟[Shen2 zhou1]
deity/soul/spirit/unusual/mysterious/lively/expressive/expression/look/CL:個|个[ge4]/(slang) awesome/amazing
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
surname Guang
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
wide/numerous/to spread
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]

sentences.english: Nuwa not only to the day of salvation, but also in creation, work miracles.
sentences.chinese: 女娲不但补天救世，还创造万物，神通广大。

sentences.english: I was no longer Lucy who knew what was best for everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 我不再是知道那个神通广大的露西了。

sentences.english: Lee is a person who would spend money secretly to make people believe he was infinitely capable and influential.
sentences.chinese: 他背地里花钱，为要人们相信他神通广大，有权有势。

sentences.english: You're big in Naas. You haven't bought off any judges, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你在纳斯神通广大。你没有买通过什么法官吧，是吗？

definition: to prophesy with supernatural accuracy (idiom)/to have an incredible foresight
to know all under heaven/exceptionally talented (idiom)
predictable/sth one can predict without being a clairvoyant
lit. to go up to heaven or down to Hades (idiom)/fig. to go to great lengths/to search heaven and earth
Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
an eccentric/odd person/person of extraordinary talent
very able person
to call the wind and summon the rain (idiom); to exercise magical powers/fig. to stir up troubles
mystery/unfathomable/enigmatic
highly intelligent (idiom)
deceitful in many ways (idiom); wily and mischievous/full of craft and cunning
skills acquired through religious practice/(fig.) ability/skill/Taiwan pr. [dao4 hang5]
special ability
divine strategy and wonderful planning (idiom)/clever scheme/supremely clever in his schemes
remarkable ability/magical power
reincarnation or transmigration (Buddhism)
